Title: Provides for compensation for injury or death caused by the negligent entrustment of a firearm
Summary: Provides for compensation for injury or death caused by the negligent entrustment of a firearm.
LawCode: Add ยง11-108, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to providing for compensation for injury or death caused by the negligent entrustment of a firearm
